name: NOOB
description:
The NOOB token is the primary crypto token within Blast Royale. With a total supply of 512 million tokens, it enables players to access exclusive features and engage with the broader Web3 economy. Players can use NOOB tokens to purchase limited-edition skins, characters, and bundles, as well as to trade NFTs within the Blast Hub marketplace. The marketplace facilitates buying, selling, and transferring digital assets, enhancing the gameâ€™s decentralized economy.
In addition to its role in transactions, the NOOB token is also a reward mechanism. Players can earn NOOB through gameplay activities, leaderboard achievements, and special events. It is also used as an entry fee for high-stakes tournaments, where winners receive a share of the prize pool.
